name: A Collection of Interesting Mechanics
description:
You (and your friends) are air traffic controllers during futuristic WW2. it is your job to spot the planes, and relay to missile command what number of plane they need to shoot down. Teams are determined by colors, Allied are blue, Germans are red.

The second menu option (I'll keep it a surprise until you see it) unfortunately breaks the UI for the points and health system. I've tried multiple ways to fix this. But i'm afraid it would require a complete restructure of the gamemode and gamestate blueprints (in short, a hell of a lot of work). So for now, it kinda works and kinda doesn't. So just have as much fun with that as you want.

There are also two easter eggs to be found in the game, so happy hunting.
